Это тот ещё шедевр всех времен, я скажу даже больше оно лучше чем CSGO. Почему? да потому-что тут есть та самая атмосфера на серверах, где админы и люди сидят и играют ни какой токсичности, игра под вечерочек, и тут нет официальных серверов, это объяснимо так как игре уже 18 лет. Эту дядю помнит каждый человек, ЭХ Ностальгия

Not only does this bad boy give you textures for Gmod, but the game is amazing. I've heard so many people say: "oH iT's aN uNfInIsHeD gAmE!1!!!" To that, I reply with: it is a good game, silence you degenerate. Anyways, this game has a lot of things CS:GO doesn't, but misses the things CS:GO does have. There is a lot of customization to the servers and all which I love, but there isn't any workshop for mods, which I personally dislike as the workshop is a good place for trusted mods and all, but this is a good game regardless. 
     I had a lot of fun in my current 16 hours of play time, listening to music while losing my sanity after getting my ass handed to me by an easy bot. I wish that music could be added into matches so the map isn't so damn creepy, but it's not like that's going to be changed any time soon. Over all, I recommend this to people who want a good time with a group of friends, and a person who has no friends and enjoys the company of bots the reflect the actions of players. The game play is great, the maps are amazing, the textures are good for their time, and everything else is great. I like this game, buy it. Buy it. Buy it. Buy it. Buy it. Buy it. Buy it. Buy it.
